translations.CCA+ or/and Hematuria, children <2 years: CCA+ or/and Hematuria, children <2 years-old should be evaluated before treatment
translations.Check in 'Results' for relevant tests or: Check in 'Results' for relevant tests ordered
translations.Confirmed intestinal schistosomiasis (if: Confirmed intestinal schistosomiasis (if CCA+ or faeces microscopy+)
translations.Date of onset of the disease: Date of onset of the disease
translations.Do not treat pregnant woman in the first: Do not treat pregnant woman in the first trimester
translations.Faeces microscopy result - presence of s: Faeces microscopy result - presence of schistossomiasis
translations.If a woman, did she collect specimen dur: If a woman, did she collect specimen during her period?
translations.If necessary, schedule a follow up visit: If necessary, schedule a follow up visit in 'Appointments'
translations.Please check in 'Conditions', 'Allergies: Please check in 'Conditions', 'Allergies' and 'Medications' and update it if necessary
